bwg.additional_tasks¶

Module contents¶

Defining additional tasks for the NLP pipeline.

class bwg.additional_tasks.PipelineRunInfoGenerationTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: luigi.task.Task

Generates information about the current run of the pipeline.

class bwg.additional_tasks.RelationMergingTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: luigi.task.Task, bwg.mixins.ArticleProcessingMixin

Merge relations gained from OpenRelationExtractionTask and ParticipationExtractionTask.

class bwg.additional_tasks.RelationsDatabaseWritingTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: luigi.task.Task

Writes relations extracted via (naive) Open Relation Extraction and Participation Extraction into a graph database.

categorize_node(label, node_data)¶

Assign a node a category out of a pre-defined set of categories. This function can be overwritten by tasks inheriting from this tasks.

Parameters:
  • label – Node label
  • node_data (dict) – Node’s data.
Tyoe label:

str
Returns:

Category for node.
Return type:

str
is_relevant_node(label, node_data)¶

Determine whether a node is relevant and should be written to the database. This function can be overwritten by tasks inheriting from this tasks.

Parameters:
  • label – Node label
  • node_data (dict) – Node’s data.
Tyoe label:

str
Returns:

Result of check.
Return type:

bool
pipeline_run_info = None¶
process_article(raw_article, database, entity_properties)¶

Process an article generated by previous tasks and process them.

Parameters:
  • raw_article (str) – Raw unserialized article.
  • database (bwg.db.neo4j.Neo4jTarget) – Neo4j luigi target.
  • entity_properties (dict) – Wikidata properties of all entities as dictionary.
